definition: Hani ethnic group
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
a Pekinese/a pug/(dialect) to scold
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)
Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture in Yunnan 雲南|云南
pinyin: Hong2 he2 Ha1 ni2 zu2 Yi2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1

definition: former Pu'er Hani and Yi autonomous county in Yunnan, renamed in 2007 Ning'er Hani and Yi autonomous county 寧洱哈尼族彞族自治縣|宁洱哈尼族彝族自治县, capital Pu'er city 普洱市

definition: Jiangcheng Hani and Yi autonomous county in Pu'er 普洱[Pu3 er3], Yunnan

sentences.english: The traditional music of the Hanis is a large music system.
sentences.chinese: 哈尼族传统音乐文化是一个庞大的音乐体系。

sentences.english: And I also have a number of Hani friends.
sentences.chinese: 我还有好几位哈尼族的朋友呢。

sentences.english: Yuanyang, a Hani minority settlement with vast rice- terraces .
sentences.chinese: 元阳县，哈尼族居住区，有大片稻谷梯田。

sentences.english: Oh, I know the Hani ethnic group.
We Aini people, are a branch of the ethnic Hani minority.
sentences.chinese: 我们爱伲人，是哈尼族的一个分支。

sentences.english: Since time immemorial , Hani women have participated in fish-raising.
sentences.chinese: 自古以来，哈尼族妇女就是梯田养鱼的参与者。

sentences.english: That's great Hani , thank you on behalf of all.
sentences.chinese: 这就是伟大的哈尼族，谢谢你代表所有。
